title: Police Agencies Defy Critics and Show ‘In God We Trust’
text:
Police Agencies Defy Critics and Show ‘In God We Trust’ 
Published By: NYTimes - Today 
Many Southern and Midwestern law enforcement agencies have added the axiom to squad cars, angering often-distant critics who say the moves v... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
